entry.title: [RFC] [BIP proposal] Dealing with malleability
entry.summary: On February 20, 2014, Pieter Wuille requested a BIP number via email. The content of the email was brief and to the point. Wuille simply stated that he was requesting a BIP number. In response to the email, a BIP number (BIP 62) was assigned. No further information was provided about the nature of the BIP or its purpose.
